navigation.about: About Me & How I Can Help

hero.name: Svetlana Radchenko
hero.description: I help see business in numbers, find growth points and move towards goals. I work at the intersection of analytics and empathy: I analyze business as a system and help make smart, precise decisions.

about.title: About Me & How I Can Help
about.intro: Finance practitioner with 26+ years of experience in financial management and project development. Ex-CFO of Bioprocess Group and Irish public company Ovoca Bio plc, PhD in Economics, mentor, lecturer and expert at the 'Towards Change' foundation. Consultant for accelerators, universities, international programs and moderator of events at Zarubezhexpo.

facts.title: Finance practitioner with 26+ years of experience in financial management and project development, including international and public companies.
facts.cfo: Ex-CFO of Bioprocess Group and Irish public company Ovoca Bio plc
facts.academic: PhD in Economics, lecturer, mentor and expert at "Towards Change" foundation
facts.consultant: Consultant for accelerators, universities and international programs
facts.moderator: Moderator and speaker at business events, including Zarubezhexpo business forums
